languages.text:
The wearer gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
Whenever an ally is affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, that ally gains +{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

languages.text:
装备者获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}。
每当盟友受到装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}技能{/g}影响时，该名盟友下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}，等同于{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2}%。此效果不可叠加。

Whenever an ally is affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, that ally gains +{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text:
装备者获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}。
每当盟友受到装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}技能{/g}影响时，该名盟友下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}，等同于<u>（2×（意志{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}+社交加值））</u>%。此效果不可叠加。

装备者获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}。
每当盟友受到装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}技能{/g}影响时，该名盟友下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}，等同于{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2}%。此效果不可叠加。

languages.text:
Дает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}.
Становясь целью {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} персонажа, союзник получает +{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} в свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Эффект не суммируется.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
Whenever an ally is affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, that ally gains +{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text:
Дает +10 к Воле и Общительности.
Становясь целью способности персонажа, союзник получает +<u>(2 × (бонус ВОЛ + бонус ОБЩ))</u>% к снижению уклонения в свой следующий ход. Эффект не суммируется.

Дает +10 к Воле и Общительности.
Становясь целью способности персонажа, союзник получает +<u>(2 × (бонус ВОЛ + бонус ОБЩ))</u>% к снижению уклонения в свой следующий ход. Эффект не суммируется.

Дает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}.
Становясь целью {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} персонажа, союзник получает +{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} в свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Эффект не суммируется.

languages.text:
使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}を10獲得する。
味方が使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の影響を受けるたび、その味方は次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で+{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2}%の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}を獲得する。この効果はスタックしない。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
Whenever an ally is affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, that ally gains +{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text:
使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}を10獲得する。
味方が使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の影響を受けるたび、その味方は次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で<u>(2 × (WP{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} + FELボーナス))</u>％の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}を獲得する。この効果はスタックしない。

使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}を10獲得する。
味方が使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の影響を受けるたび、その味方は次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2}％の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}を獲得する。この効果はスタックしない。

languages.text:
El portador obtiene +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}.
Cada vez que las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del portador afecten a un aliado, este último obtiene +{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} en su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
Whenever an ally is affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, that ally gains +{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text:
El portador obtiene +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}.
Cada vez que las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del portador afecten a un aliado, este último obtiene +<u>(2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por VOL + bonificación por EMP))</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} en su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

El portador obtiene +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}.
Cada vez que las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del portador afecten a un aliado, este último obtiene +{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} en su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text:
Der Träger erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}.
Wenn ein Verbündeter von den {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Trägers betroffen ist, erhält dieser Verbündete +{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} auf seinen nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. Nicht stapelbar.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
Whenever an ally is affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, that ally gains +{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}.
Immer wenn ein Verbündeter von den {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Trägers betroffen ist, erhält dieser Verbündete +<u>(2 × (WK-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} + GEF-Bonus))</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} auf seinen nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. Addiert sich nicht.

Der Träger erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}.
Immer wenn ein Verbündeter von den {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Trägers betroffen ist, erhält dieser Verbündete +{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} auf seinen nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. Stapelt sich nicht.

languages.text:
L'utilisateur bénéficie de +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}.
Chaque fois qu'un allié est sous l'effet de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de l'utilisateur, cet allié bénéficie de +{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} lors de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Non cumulable.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
Whenever an ally is affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, that ally gains +{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text:
L'utilisateur bénéficie de +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fraternité{/g}.
Chaque fois qu'un allié est sous l'effet de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de l'utilisateur, cet allié bénéficie de +<u>(2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de VOL + bonus de FRA))</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} lors de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Non cumulable.

L'utilisateur bénéficie de +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}.
Chaque fois qu'un allié est sous l'effet de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de l'utilisateur, cet allié bénéficie de +{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} lors de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Non cumulable.

L'utilisateur bénéficie de +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}.
Chaque fois qu'un allié est sous l'effet de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de l'utilisateur, cet allié bénéficie de +{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} lors de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Non cumulable.

languages.text:
Takan kişi, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} kazanır.
Bir dost birim, takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerinden{/g} her etkilendiğinde bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunda{/g} +%{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2} kadar {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g} kazanır. Etki üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
Whenever an ally is affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, that ally gains +{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.
